class MakeFrame[source]

MakeFrame(column_names) :: BaseEstimator

Base class for all estimators in scikit-learn.

Notes

All estimators should specify all the parameters that can be set at the class level in their __init__ as explicit keyword arguments (no *args or **kwargs).

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Usage

Call MakeFrame as the last component in your pipeline with the desired column names.

pipeline = Pipeline([
    ...,
    ('output', MakeFrame(['outlier', 'class'])),
])
  • Refer to this notebook for an example
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ImputeMissingValues[source]

ImputeMissingValues(num_mode=mean, cat_mode='MISSING') :: BaseEstimator

DataFrame input - DataFrame output During fit -

  1. Store imputable value for each column During transform -
  2. Impute missing values with imputable value
  3. Create a '{col}_na' boolean column to tell if cells contained missing value
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
